dict.string: Configure Apple Remote Desktop (VNC server is disabled).

#!/bin/sh
# Admin user account admin_user='mac_sys_admin'
KICKSTART='/System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Resources/kickstart'
# Set kickstart options -ControlObserve and -ObserveOnly are off # use -privs -all to give user all privileges $KICKSTART -configure -users $admin_user -access -on -privs -DeleteFiles -TextMessages -OpenQuitApps -GenerateReports -RestartShutDown -SendFiles -ChangeSettings
# Disable access for other users $KICKSTART -configure -allowAccessFor -specifiedUsers -restart -agent -menu

#!/bin/sh
# Admin user account admin_user='mac_sys_admin'
KICKSTART='/System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Resources/kickstart'
# Remove user access and privileges $KICKSTART -configure -users $admin_user -access -off -privs -none
# Disable ARD $KICKSTART -deactivate -stop exit 0
